name: King Tut's Tomb Adventure (ShareData)
overview: Released as part of "Bits, Pieces and Clues" and "Interactive Adventures" game packs. Based on the same initial code that the 1979 PET adventure that spawned several versions of this game for different Commodore machines. This is an Egyptian themed text adventure, like the original versions the goal is to score 175 points by collecting treasure. In the game the player starts outside a big pyramid with nothing but some food, some matches and a torch. It's up to the player to explore the massive tunnel systems inside the pyramid in order to find all the treasures. In this version they added easier to read text, and game saving and loading mechanics as well as some small game improvements and bug fixes over other versions of this game.
